channel.title: CVE Feed for Huawei -- EMUI
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Huawei -- EMUI

item.title: CVE-2022-31754|2024-08-03T07:26:01.160Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Logical defects in code implementation in some products. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability may affect the availability of some features.

item.title: CVE-2022-48490|2024-08-03T15:17:54.631Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Configuration defects in the secure OS module.Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will affect availability.

item.title: CVE-2022-39003|2024-08-03T11:10:32.163Z -- huawei -- emui
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in the video framework. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability will affect the confidentiality and integrity of trusted components.
